!!!Attention Army!!!   Our str3@ms on YouTube are getting very low. Pls go stream on YouTube and other platforms at least twice a day.  Here are the most important things to pay special attention to while str3@ming:  Turn off autoplay  Make sure the video quality is above 480p  Volume must be 50% or more  Don't skip/pause/double tap to move ten seconds forward + DON'T spam in the comments (no em0jis)  After you streamed one mv, don't str3@m the same mv AGAIN. Watch 2-3 other mv's in between to make your view count.  You can also str3@m with your earphones plugged in if it is too loud for you.   Copy and spread!!!
Daily reminder to stream BST, FIRE, DOPE mv along with BUTTER & PTD daily..these mvs are close to become next 1B mvs. *FIRE and DOPE on 1theK!!!* Add these in your daily streaming list. Push BST more pls!!!

You remember all of that stupid and adorable fangirling stuff you did.. That scream whenever you saw bts posters  That savage fighting with haters That unbearable wait of their vlive and that unmeasurable pain when you missed it That desperate try to get a reply on weverse Those daydreams of marrying your bias That patient wait of Tuesday for a run bts episode That blushing while reading the ffs That passionate try of learning Korean Those stupid ideas of sneaking into bts concert without money That uplift of mood whenver you heard about them That silly fights with your army friend for having a same bias Those songs Those episodes Those memories Those emotions Those days It all clicks together Then there are memes bringing you flashbacks of their crackheadness and us adoring it You really miss it all But the memories will forever stay with you and will be probably the best ones of your life  You go to your room open the drawer in which you have all your bts photographs albums and memories treasured You look at them with tears still in your eyes  and say it was the best life anyone could ever live Thankyou BTS for saving me thankyou for bringing the best of me out

Note: I commented 3 days ago that butter needs to be the fastest to reach 1 billion. Well I have changed the plans and now I will focus on 'Permission to Dance'. I have calculated and noticed that most of the ARMYs do not stre3am after the premiere just like 'Butter'. If all the 3.9 Million ARMYs that saw the premiere would have streamed Butter 50 times the views would have been almost 190 Million. So if there are more than 4 Million concurrent viewers on the premiere of 'Permission to Dance' and they all str3am it 50 times in the first 24 hours the views would reach more than 200 Million views. It would really brake the internet. Copy and paste this on every MV and show of the episodes.

Dynamite
SOS ARMYs! The new single of BTS, an English summer anthem 'Butter' comes on this Friday, May 21 at 00:00 EST/13:00 KST  You can find the teaser already here -> (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOMxU9f1FBU  Don't forget to like the teaser once you watched it!  You can pre-save/pre-add the song on Spotify and Apple music, or if you are a US/PR army you can even pre-order the digital single - or a physical copy of it -> (https://)www.bts-butter.com/  The new song is going to be performed for the first time at this years BBMAs this Sunday on May23 where they are also nominated for several awards. For one of them it depends on our votes if they win it. It is very important to participate in the voting while you can especially since as always, other kpop fandoms joined together to vote against us. This time however even western fans joined them. Let's do our best and vote on our boys as much as we can. Let's make this night even more memorable by winning them the Top Social Award for another year as they deserve, and let's make this comeback even more historical than any other comeback before by breaking our own records. Our first 24 hour views goal is 105 Million views. Definitely doable with the huge growth of our fandom, Dynamite had 101,1 Million views back then! Tune in to the premier on Bangtantv youtube channel half an hour before the MV drops(on May 21 at 00:00 EST/13:00 KST), like the video during the premier and once it ends don't go anywhere, you will be automatically redirected to HYBE LABEL's youtube channel to the new MV! Don't forget: don't ever loop, don't put the song or MV on repeat on any str3aming platform, no matter how much you like the song! Use playlists with the exception on youtube, on youtube str3am manually, watch other BTS videos in between such as Dynamite MV or the audio version of Butter which will be uploaded on Bangtantv youtube channel once the MV drops. On Spotify, Apple Music etc use playlists and switch them about every hour, interact with them, and NEVER put the song or the playlist on repeat or your str3am are going to be filtered! Avoid bot behaviour as much as you can. To avoid your str3ams getting filtered use premium accounts on all str3aming platform. You don't have to pay for them at all just get a free premium trial, activate it and cancel them before they end. I'm going to leave you links to free trials below, use them^^ Another fun additional info in case you don't know: McDonalds is also promoting the new single this time. For that matter there is going to be a BTS Menu available at McDonalds in almost 50 countries all over the world starting from May 27 (May 26 in the US). Please check your local McDonalds for more information to see if the BTS menu will be available in your country! :)  I'm also leaving you how to vote on BTS for the BBMAs, we still have a few days. You can vote both on website and social media. 10 votes/voting platform/account/day. If you wanna vote more than that a day you can, you just need to use another account, be it twitter or facebook.  How to vote:  For website vote go here -> (https://)www.billboard.com/p/bbmasvote/  To vote on twitter tweet something using the hashtag #BBMAsTopSocial and tag @BTS_twt (RTs are counted, too)  Every vote matters and is important!  And as promised here are some free premium trials for you, just click on the links and activate them on all platform you use to make sure your str3am wont't be filtered ->  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  Apple Music: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D  Let's make this comeback even bigger and legendary than any other before and make our boys happy the way they always make us happy!  Teamwork makes the dream work!  Happy comeback season fam :)

PLEASE READ THIS IS VERY IMPORTANT This is just a small calculation as to how we can get max views. There are about 46.4M subscribers to bangtan tv and No More Dream has 187M views(As of March 19 2021). So I'm assuming that these are the fans that have youtube. In an other google search result i found that BTS has 136.4M fans. So this calculation is based on the people on youtube. We have 85 days (Again as of March 19 2021) till our anniversary. Let's just assume that out of the 46.4M about 6M people didn't get the memo to stream or are student ARMYs who have exams and don't want to get their eyebrows shaved off by Joon plus its easier to calculate with the numbers rounded offğŸ˜…ğŸ˜….We have 40M left. Even if 1 ARMY watches No More Dream MV twice a day we get 80M views in a day and in 85 days that's 6B and 800M i repeat SIX BILLION EIGHT HUNDRED MILLION views . Ig the reason that's not happening is bcos some ARMYs are focused on Dynamite,and that's not wrong either.The rate at which Dynamite's views are increasing is about 3M in 12 hours however i did notice that after the scammys the views increased a bit faster. As of today Dynamite has 936M views. If the views keep increasing by 3M views a day then the ARMYs streaming Dynamite will reach 1B in another 21 days(April 9 2021 approximately). And that means from that day we will have 64 days to our anniversary. So that'll probably mean that the ARMYs streaming Dynamite rn would be back to No More Dream hopefully. And that'll increase our manpower. The rate at which No More Dream MV's views are increasing is roughly 1M a day- yesterday i.e March 18 2021 the views went from 186M to 187M- and yes ik that's really lessğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­. Anyhow if all ARMYs all stream this together with the increased manpower at 1 ARMY=1 view then we get 40M views a day and in 64 days thats 2B and 560M views. This calculation sounds crazy but i went over it like 10 times with a calculator and googled the number of 0s in millions and billions.....yeah that's the amount of trust i have in my math skills but i hope this enlightened everyone and share this as much as possible and if there is smn wrong with the calculation let me know.  And here are some streaming tips that I gathered 1. Watch the vid from the beginning to the very last second and apparently the 30 sec thing isn't true 2. Don't press replay or rewind after the video is over  3. Don't cheat by opening various incognito tabs, ur views will be deleted 4. Make sure that the volume in youtube is above 50% but your laptop volume can be less or even muted if u are busy 5. Watch other videos in between.Yes this sounds counterproductive but this actually makes sure that youtube doesn't count your view as a spam and delete it so u can alternate with Dynamite,Life Goes On,On...basically any other vid. 6. Like i mentioned don't press the replay button instead wait till u get that option and then close the tab,open it again and then play it or better yet search for No More Dream and then play it 7. Don't increase the playback speed it has to be in Normal  My comment somehow got deleted thats why i've posted it again  Borahae ARMYsğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œ

Down to earth boys, appreciating the music and artists/groups/dances that came before them (and I'm not that even a big fan of those artists that came before them but I appreciate the music they've put on the table before this new generation) I'm honestly appreciative and happy to come across this group, they're sweet and funny and really puts the effort and releases some good music, not to mention, very inspiring. The military seized the power from the government and took over the authority. We citizens are still in confusion worrying about what will happen the next day. ë‹¹ì‹ ì€ ìˆ˜ë§ì€ ì™¸êµ­ì–´ì—ì„œ í•œê¸€ì„ ì°¾ìœ¼ì…¨ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤

Let's BTS ,tell me it's meaning
Unpopular opinion: *Dynamite is too overhyped.* Compared to BTS lyrical masterpieces like I Need U, Save Me, BST, DNA, Mic Drop, Idol, Euphoria etc, Dynamite was nowhere close enough. The lyrics were plain nonsensical.   "Get this beat cha ching like money" ~ Dynamite  vs  "I may be a bit blunt, I may lack some things I may not have that shy glow around me But this is me My arms, my legs, my heart, my soul Not so perfect but so beautiful I'm the one I should love" ~ Epiphany  and  "While I stand on this hot, empty stage I fear the emptiness In my complicated thoughts On the lines of life I pretend to be blunt about it Itâ€™s not even the first time Itâ€™s time I should be used to it Even though I try to hide it I canâ€™t As the stage gets cooler I leave the empty audience seats" ~ Young Forever  Do I even need to say anything? Dynamite had a catchy tune and that's all it had. The MV was quite underwhelming compared to the masterpieces they have released in the past (Mic Drop and BST just keep me coming back everyday). They could have done a lot more with the retro concept and the stylisation could use a lot of work. Jin's hair colour didn't suit him at all and the ONLY outfit I even remember was Tae's green gucci suit. The rest of the outfits were expensive as hell too, but too bland and generic. Simply put, Dynamite is the only BTS song that was way overhyped. I love BTS to bits, but I don't believe in sending a misleading message to our boys that putting out mediocre songs which armys will stream crazily just to break so and so's record is the way to go. THEY CAN DO SO MUCH BETTER AND BE IS THE PROOF.
Es orible

How to str3am well: 1) have the session started 2) Don't use incognito mode 3) Don't l00p the video 4) See the video with the volume +50% 5) See again the video after 2-3 anothers videos. It's better see others MV's of BTS with the sames conditions to str3am 6) Don't use em0jis 7) Don't report or answer hate c0mments, just ignore them 8) Censorship the words like str3am, em0jis, vi3ws, etc... 9) See the ads on the video, or at least the half of them 10) Don't pause, advance or lag the video 11) See the video +480p 12) Like the video at the end 13) Don't dowloand the video, better share it 14) Search the video manually 15) Don't use VPN, APK, etc  I hope I helped you :) Please, share it to others Armys

FOR COMEBACK:  Please make sure you are logged into YouTube for streaming Dynamite and BE for comeback .... views will count on YT if you are not logged in, but not for Billboard.  So please ensure you are logged in.  For new ARMY's, when you are streaming do not skip, pause, FF or manipulate the MV in any way ... don't skip ads, they are part of the view.  DO NOT use the mini-player, or view the MV in a separate window on your browser, or YT will not count the view.  Have 8 to 10 minutes in between views of the MV, do not repeat the MV over and over, or it will not count.  Keep your comments to 1 to 2 for each view, otherwise YT may see your comments as spam and delete your view.  You can queue your songs, but DO NOT use playlist in the first 24 hours ... songs on a playlist will not be counted by YT for hours and sometimes days, so please don't use a saved playlist.

*9 hours to BE Comeback Countdown at BangtanTV* *9.5 hours to Life Goes On MV at BHL* *Make sure you don't stream at fake channels; two have been reported*
EMERGENCY ARMY! BTS's very first self-directed album 'BE' drops in a few hours, on November 20th at 2pm KST/12am EST.  The members were heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet.  "It's an album from which you can feel the entirety of each member's warmth" to quote Hobi. This will be their most personal and most intimate album so far. Let's do our best to make history again and give the boys what they deserve!  You can watch the two teaser videos of their new MV 'Life Goes On'(directed by Jungkook) here ->  Teaser 1: (https://)youtu.be/Wq5S8Dt_HQE  Teaser 2: (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=t3KZnCgiMW0&ab_channel=BigHitLabels  'Life Goes On' digital mp3 pre-order:  (https://)bts-be.us/products/life-goes-on-mp3  'BE' album pre-order:  (https://)biglink.to/bebts  'BE' album pre-save link on Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer: (https://)www.bts-be.com/  Join in for the MV premier on bangtantv's Youtube channel half an hour before the MV drops (at 11:30pm KST). Like the video and stay there till the countdown ends, it will automatically direct you to the 'Life Goes On' MV!  Our first 24 hours goal on Youtube is 105 Million views. We got 101 Million on Dynamite, we can definitely do it! Very important to not use playlists on Youtube in the first 24 hours because views are counted slower in playlists. It would badly affect our goal. Search for the MV manually by using the searching bar and never refresh or never ever loop/replay/put an MV (or song) on autoplay! Such streams are always filtered out/deleted! Watch other videos in between, preferably other official BTS videos. You can watch the audio videos from the new album bangtantv will release to boost the streams of the album or other BTS MVs.  Use playlists all the time on OTHER platforms like Spotfy or Apple Music but switch them frequently, about every hour. It's a key to stream correctly! Switch playlists, interact with them, pause or skip songs sometimes to look less botlike.  If you can't stream aloud because you are at school/work or are sleeping just use earphones and stream like that. Never mute!  If you don't have the time to stream on Youtube manually in the first 24 hours I still advise you to put the videos in a queue instead of using playlists. Playlist is no good on this one platform.^^  Stay consistent, stay strong, don't panic even if the views will feeze or get deleted, it's normal and happens to everyone while Youtube is trying to verify all views in the high traffic. They will add views back later on so just keep streaming. Get motivation from such situations and push even harder!  From the moment the MV/album drops it's BTS lockdown. We don't pay any attention to hate. If you see any just report and move on, don't interact, that's what they want. Don't even tell others, don't mind them, don't let them ruin the comeback for you. Just ignore and enjoy the comeback.  A last tip: to lessen the chance of your views being considered as bot behaviour and being filtered out/deleted what you can and should do is get a free premium trial on all streaming platforms you used to use. They cost nothing! And only take about a minute. It worked amazingly during Dynamite comeback, we need it this time too, it is crucial. So please if you still haven't yet this is the perfect time to activate a free premium trial, so do it! If you had one for Dynamite and it has expired since then it's all fine, just create a new account on whichever platform and activate the free premium trial there.  Free premium trials for you ->  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  Apple Music: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D   If you wanna help with sales by buying the album/song/MV on iTunes but don't have an apple device it's no problem, you can use iTunes on PC/laptop too, just download it there and you can buy them all.  If you wanna help by streaming on Apple Music and don't have an apple device don't worry, you can download Apple Music on android/PC/laptop, it will work perfectly fine on those too. But beware! IF you bought a song or the MV on iTunes you have to go to your Apple Music lybrary and delete them from there or otherwise your streams won't be counted. This is very important, don't forget about it. This is only if you buy the songs/MV on iTunes. iTunes -> for buying Apple Music -> for streaming  Let's get the boys high with this comeback, they mentioned their worris about this one since it is a very meaningful album for them and it most likely won't get any support from the industry like how Dynamite did since it's all in Korean this time. The boys really wanna get those #1 positions on all charts with songs in their native language too, let's make their dream come true and make them happy!  And most importantly: enjoy the comeback fam!  Happy comeback season ğŸ’œ

ARMY!!! BTS's very first self-directed album 'BE' drops this Friday, November 20th at 2pm KST/12am EST.  The members were heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. This album is gonna be their most personal and intimate album so far, let's make it the most historical too!   Watch and like the two teasers of the MV of the new title track 'Life Goes On' (directed by Jungkook) ->  Teaser 1: (https://)youtu.be/Wq5S8Dt_HQE  Teaser 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t3KZnCgiMW0&ab_channel=BigHitLabels  Pre-order 'BE' album here:  (https://)biglink.to/bebts  Pre-order 'Life Goes On' digital mp3 if you are a US/Puerto Rico army here:  (https://)bts-be.us/products/life-goes-on-mp3  Pre-save 'BE' album on Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer to be among the first ones who can listen to the album: (https://)www.bts-be.com/  Get your free premium trials on all streaming platforms you use to make sure you won't be considered as a bot and your streams won't be filtered out/deleted. This way your streams will also weigh a lot more on the charts and you will be extremely helpful to get the boys to the #1 place on all charts. They cost nothing!  Free premium trials for different platforms (if you already had them for Dynamite comeback don't worry about it expiring, you can get another trial for free just create new accounts):  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  Apple Music: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D   Don't forget these trials are crucial for our streams, it worked last time too but we need more people to get these and all of you to keep even stronget and more consistent since we don't have the industry's help this time. (Dynamite was in English hence the support for that.)  Don't panic if the views freeze on Youtube, it happens to everyone because of the huge traffic in views. It can last for hours but views will be added back later, keep on streaming fam! Even if you see views being deleted keep streaming, views can be added back later! All we can do is go even harder whenever youtube wants to do something tricky.^^  Don't forget the number one rule: never loop/put the MV/song on repeat or autoplay anywhere! On Youtube stream manually searching the MV and other BTS videos by using the searching bar. Watch 3-4 other videos in between 'Life Goes On', avoid lyrics videos tho. Watch the audio videos of the songs from 'BE' album, bangtantv gonna upload them. They also count for the charts!  On Spotify or Apple Music use playlists and switch them frequently, about every hour. It's very important, switch them! Avoid every bot behaviours! If you can't stream aloud because you are at school, work etc just use earphones.  US/Puerto Rico armys, if you wanna buy the album/title track but don't have the money request funds from our funding accounts. Funding accounts help armys with the money of other helpful armys. You don't have to pay it back! Armys who wanna help to US/Puerto Rico armys who wanna buy the new album/title track but can't because of lack of money, you can donate to said funding accounts! Any amount is helpful.  Funding accounts for US/Puerto Rico armys ->  fundsforbangtan:  Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan  borahaefunds:  (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds  usarmyfunds:  (https://)twitter.com/USARMYFUNDS  fundsforusarmys:  (https://)twitter.com/FundsForUSARMYs  Check them out and read their terms to make sure you get the funds if you request.^^  Let's work hard together to make this comeback as historical as it deserves whether with the help of western industry or not. We don't need the western industry, and contrary to what they believe BTS does NOT need an English song for us to love them and for the songs to be successful, right? Let's get all those #1s on billboard hot 100, hot 200 and all existing charts! Let's get them real awards they deserve aside from the mocking top social awards!  Let's get this fam!  In the meantime also don't forget to vote on BTS in all categories on MAMA the most prestigious Korean award show every day ->  (https://)mama.mwave.me/en/vote  Enjoy the comeback everyone, that's the most important.  Happy comeback season! ğŸ’œ

Even though each device has its own IP address, all devices using home wifi will have ONE IP address. To use 2 accounts properly, use one device on cell data and one device on wifi.  Those with data limitations should watch fewer MVs at 360p than more at lower resolution.  YT deletes low quality playbacks.  Laptop users should be minimum 480p. No split screens or reduced screen sizes.

Don't skip ads/watch the m/v for ATLEAST 30 secs.  4. Like the m/v after watching it all the way through. (Only like at the end)  5. Avoid bot like behavior.  6. Who is not tired of watching Dynamite music videos???
ATTENTION ARMY! BTS's new album, their very first self-directed album "BE" is coming this Friday, November 20th at 2pm KST/12am EST!!! The boys were heavily involved in production, composition and design too making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. It's gonna be their most personal and most intimate album so far. Let's make it the most historical too!  Pre-order the album "BE" here: (http://)biglink.to/bebts Pre-order "Life Goes On" digital single here: (https://)bts-be.us/products/life-goes-on-mp3 Pre-save BE on Spotify, Apple Music and Deezer to be among the first ones who can listen to the album: (http://)bts-be.com  We did so amazing with Dynamite fam, no comeback has ever been as successful and also joyful as that one. However that time we were supported by Columbia Records and the industry in general. Now we can not count on them since the album is not in English but in Korean. We all know how ugly the industry has been treating BTS ever since they debuted, how the western media constantly ridicule them and also us, their fandom. They see BTS as a crazy phenomenon which will disappear soon and us as mad, rapid fans. Also, the boys already mentioned their worries if they could ever reach as high with a song in Korean as they did with Dynamite. Our fandom grew so much, and we got so much stronger. Let's do this fam! Let's work hard together for the boys to get them another #1 hot 100 on billboard with the title track and even a #1 hot 200 with the album! Let's make history again! Let's show the industry BTS is here to stay whether they like it or not!  Some tips:   - Buy the album, buy the digital title track, pre-save the album. Buy the songs on iTunes, you can do that without an apple device too, just download iTunes on PC or laptop  - Don't forget to get your free premium trials on all platform where you used to stream, they are crucial. Premium accounts can not be considered as bots and the streams should be less filtered with those. It worked with Dynamite too, we must be prepared! If you already had a trial before don't worry, you can get another one for free just create another account and activate it there  - Stream correctly, don't loop, don't put anything on repeat or autoplay, be it the MV or the songs  - On Youtube don't use playlists, and watch the audio videos of the songs from "BE" which bighit will release on bangtantv. Don't watch lyrics videos (especially jaeguchi) or reaction videos in the first 24 hours. IMPORTANT: the views WILL be frozen after a while, maybe even for long hours! Don't panic! It's normal and happens to everyone, keep streaming. The views will be added later! Don't panic even if our views will be deleted, it's difficult to be monitoring such high traffic on a video, views can be added back later. "Life Goes On" MV premier starts half an hour before the MV/album drops, join in on youtube and like the video   - Don't forget to stream on Spotify and Apple Music too, streams on those platforms worth much more on the charts. You can use Apple Music without apple device, it can be used on android phone too, or even on PC/laptop  - Stream consistently and correctly without looping, use playlists on Spotify and Apple Music and switch them hourly. If you can't stream loud just use headset (at work, school etc) This is all important because what we aim for is charting high. For that we need high streams, high sales and high radio spins, but because of the industry's xenophobic and racist mindset we can't expect that part, we must make up for the lack of it by the high streams.   If we do this, if we keep streaming consistent and correct in the next weeks we can make their dream come true so they can reach high even with a Korean album/title track. We can chart them high and if we stay consistent we can secure them serious awards for the future, not just a Tops Social Artist award which award shows wanna shut us up with. This is not about a few days, this is not about records. This is about the long run, this is about cementing their name in the western industry, all around the world. Let's get this fam!  Don't forget to keep streaming Dynamite too in the meantime, the song is also part of the new album. We must keep the visibility of Dynamite since it's Grammy voting season and the song could be nominated. Grammy nominees will be announced on November 24th!  Some more useful links for you:  Watch and like 'Life Goes On' Official Teaser 1 here ->    (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wq5S8Dt_HQE&ab_channel=BigHitLabels  Activate the very crucial free premium trials on your accounts on streaming all platforms you use ->  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  AppleMusic: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D   You might don't know this but if you wanna buy the album or title track but don't have the money we have amazing funding accounts you can ask for funds from. You don't have to pay it back, this is to help to armys by the help of other armys who are willing to donate to our funding accounts. If you are a US or Puerto Rico army you have several options, check them out, read their terms and don't be afraid to request for funds if you need. Funding accounts ->  fundsforbangtan:  Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan  borahaefunds:  (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds  usarmyfunds:  (https://)twitter.com/USARMYFUNDS  fundsforusarmys:  (https://)twitter.com/FundsForUSARMYs  Last but not least: VOTE on the boys on MAMA the most prestigious Korean award show in all categories here:  (https://)mama.mwave.me/en/vote  The boys are performing and promoting their new title track "Life Goes On" for the first time this Sunday at the AMAs (American Music Awards). Tune in!  And most of all, enjoy the comeback fam. Streaming is literally just listening to music/watching videos, don't forget this and don't stress. Enjoy all the beautiful music and give them as much as love as the boys poured into this beautiful album.  Happy comeback season ARMY!

I love you BTS army
ARMY the new BTS album, their very first self-directed album "BE" drops in less than a week, on Novemer 20th Friday at 2pm KST/12 am EST! The boys were heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. It's one of the most important albums they've ever released. It's very intimate and personal, and we must support them as hard as possible to make sure it can shine the brightest and reach as high as possible.  Pre-order the new album "BE" here: (http://)biglink.to/bebts  Pre-save "BE" on Spotify, Amazon Music and Deezer to be among the first ones who can listen to the album: (http://)bts-be.com  You can also pre-order the title track "Life Goes On" on casettes. Vinyls are out of stock at the moment but keep an eye on the site, it's very likely they will be restocked: (https://)bts-be.us/  Few reminders for the comeback:  - log in to the premiere of "Life Goes On" MV on Youtube half on hour before the MV drops on ibighit's channel  - don't loop/put the MV or any of the songs on repeat on any streaming platform - stream the official audios on BangtanTV, those can trend and it will create traffic for the channel - iTunes can be used on PC/laptop, you can buy the album/songs even if you don't have apple device - Apple Music can be used on laptop and Android too, you can listen to the album there too even if you don't have apple device, but don't forget to delete the songs from your lybrary in case you buy them on iTunes or else your Apple Music streams won't be counted - there are free premium trials for all platforms, activate them on all streaming platforms you use so your streams will weigh much more  Don't forget that streaming is just listening to music/watching the MV. Streaming is crucial not only for breaking records in the first place but to chart BTS and their songs high all around the world. We wanna reach #1 everywhere and stay there or as high as possible for as long as possible. Longivity is the key and for that we need to stream smart and consistent, meaning not just for the first few days but weeks. This is not only for breaking records but mostly to shut the industry which always tries to belittle the boys, and to get them the prestigious awards they dream about and what they deserve more than anyone. For years they've been mostly nominated in awards like Top Social Artist just to shut the fandom up. To get real prestigious awards the key is to chart them high and for long. And for that what we can do is to have high streams and high sales. Radio spins we can't do much about aside from requesting the songs on local radio stations as many times as we can.  Let's get this fam, we can do it! Teamwork makes the dream work!  And most of all: enjoy the comeback everyone, that's the most important^^  PS: don't forget to vote on BTS on both MAMA and AMA awards. MAMA is the most prestigious Korean award show and AMA is the American Music Award. AMA is also important because the boys are not only nominated in two categories but are also gonna perform their new song "Life Goes On" there for the first time (on November 22nd). Let's get these too!  MAMA voting ->  (https://)mama.mwave.me/en/vote  AMA voting (Favorite Duo or Group-Pop Rock and Favorite Social Artist categories) ->  (https://)www.billboard.com/amasvote

6 sleep left ARMYS! and 'BE' is ready to topped all the chart and rankings for December and 2021!!!
ARMY GET READY! The new BTS album, their very first self-directed album "BE" drops in less than a week, on Novemer 20th Friday at 2pm KST/12 am EST! The boys were heavily involved in production, composition and design too (Taehyung worked on the photos and design of the album, and the MV is gonna be in GCF style directed by Jungkook for example) making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. It's one of the most important albums they've ever released. It's very intimate and personal, and we must support them as hard as possible to make sure it can shine the brightest and reach as high as possible.  Pre-order the new album "BE" here: (http://)biglink.to/bebts  Target has a buy 2 get 1 extra for free offer now, use this opportunity and buy three copies at the price of two albums with three of your army friends, and split the price among you so you can get it cheaper.  Amazon has a -10% offer now AND if you buy BE you also get a 3 months long free premium trial for amazon music. Use this chance to get the album for cheaper price and to be able to help more when it comes to streaming the music since streams from premium accounts weigh much more on the charts.  Pre-save "BE" on Spotify, Amazon Music and Deezer to be among the first ones who can listen to the album: (http://)bts-be.com  You can also pre-order the title track "Life Goes On" on casettes. Vinyls are out of stock at the moment but keep an eye on the site, it's very likely they will be restocked: (https://)bts-be.us/  Let's make this album historical fam! This album is very important to both the boys and to all of us. They worked very hard on it and poured all their hearts into it. However we all know how badly the industry treats them. They even voiced this lately and talked about their worries if they could ever get their songs and album as high as Dynamite in their own native language too. Dynamite was pushed very hard by Columbia Records but we can safely say it was because the song was in English. We didn't hear much about them promoting the new album so far, they rather push Dynamite even harder so we better brace ourself that Life Goes On and all the other songs will get the same ugly treatment from the industry as ON got.  So let's not let it happen! Let's go out full power in promoting and streaming/buying the songs and album so it can soar high! Let's show the boys they are loved for their music, their messages, no matter the language. That music truly transcends every barrier!  Let me tell you one thing: some people like to try to guilt trip true, dedicated armys, try to make them feel bad, to bring them down and convince them what they do as a form of support is crazy, that they only care about the numbers and records, that they ruin the art the boys are creating and they diminish their hard work into mere numbers. They even dare to say the boys don't care about the numbers or records, that they care more about us being happy for the album than us working hard on reaching high numbers. Now, do you think the boys are some martyrs? They are not human beings? That they are some higher godlike existence who don't have goals, who don't have dreams, who just live like lifeless bodies working on their art like machines and move on after releasing an album? That's how you see them after all these years? After all the messages they send us through their music? After watching all the documentaries with them suffering in the industry? After all the interviews with them where they talked about their dreams and goals? We all need feedbacks in our lives that what we do is good, that what we do is loved and we are going on the right path.  The only way for us to show them our appreciation and support is through numbers.  I was thinking these days and realized maybe some of you really just don't see the bigger picture and don't understand why many of us is pushing streaming so hard. So let me explain why streaming is important the best I can: streaming literally means listening to music or watching videos, right? It's not really about the records in the long run. Everyone who actually careas about the boys know how ugly the industry treats them, that all they ever mention is how they are just a crazy phenomenon which will disappear along with their rabid fans, but there are very few who actually talk about the deep messages of their music, or the way they helped and keep helping to so many people. They totally downplay and ridicule them, and try to sabotage them every way possible. Like how they won't give radio spins, which is one of the main factors to chart high on music charts like billboard hot 100. Western artists have this advantage without any effort, they get radio spins right away, we only get more spins for Dynamite now because it's in English and even that took a long while while western artists end up on the top of radio charts in no time. The importancy of streams is not just to break a record, records are being broken all the time. Streams are important because they are also part of the main factors of charting high. And by the way charting high for a long time leads you to be at least nominated for prestigious awards, not just for a best fan artist award the industry wanna shut the fandom up with. In the US the three main factors to chart high are streams, radio spins and sales. For sales we have amazing funding accounts to help with, who - in case you never heard of them - will fund you if you wanna buy the album/songs but don't have the money for it with the donations of other helpful armys. For streams we must work hard together. For radio spins tho we can't do anything else aside from requesting the song on our local radio stations as many times as we can and to try to cover up the lack of radio spins with our high and consistent streams and sales. And the reason why many of us keep pushing people to get free premium trials on their streaming accounts is because premium streams are weighing much more on charts than streams from free accounts.   So as you can hopefully see by now this fuss about streaming is to going against a damn industry which is trying to ruin the boys every way possible. We wanna help BTS reach impossible goals usually only western atists can - for obvious reasons. Help us with the streams, spread the word about how to do it correctly and why it is important. Let's try to pay the boys back all the love and support we always get from them and let's not let them being dragged down by the xenophope, racist music industry. The boys are just as humans as we all are and they, like we all do, also need feedbacks of what they do is good and being loved. Jimin even said he wants ALL songs of this new album to chart in billboard hot 100, and I think Yoongi mentioned it enough times already that he and all of them want a Grammy, which is, by the way, only possible with high streams and sales.  So guys let's work hard together and bring the best out of this and every comback, let's show the boys our love for them and their music, and show the industry BTS is not leaving anytime soon, they are here to stay whether they want it or not!  How to stream correctly ->   - Use premium accounts! They are crucial to not being concidered as a bot which would lead to your streams being filtered out/deleted, hence we need the free premium trials. This is our trick because who has money for premium accounts? But streams from free accounts are still better than nothing as long as they are done correctly. That is if you can't get them for whatever reasons (not having a credit card for example). If you can tho I definitely advise you to get them, just use the links I'll leave you below  - Correct streaming on platforms such as Spotify, Apple Music etc means using playlists to listen to the songs. Create short playlists with the songs from BE album, MOTS7 or Dynamite, put only 2-3 songs between the title track "Life Goes On" OR just use other armys' paylists. Switch playlists freqently about every hour, never repeat/loop any song or playlist or even the album, anything, and never mute. If you are in school, working or sleeping just use headset so you can still stream.  - Correct streaming on youtube means NOT using playlists (at least in the first 24 hours because on youtube views in playlists are counted slower and it would ruin the first 24 hours record), search the new MV "Life Goes On" manually with the searching bar, watch 3-4 other videos in between the new MV, and never put the videos on repeat. Never loop, never use autoplay and never mute or your streams will be filtered.  Links for free premium trials ->  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false AppleMusic: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/ Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D  I mentioned you our funding accounts. In case you are a US/Puerto Rico army check these funding accounts out and feel free to request for funds once the album drops just read their terms beforehand so you can surely get it ->  fundsforbangtan: Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan  borahaefunds: (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds  usarmyfunds: (https://)twitter.com/USARMYFUNDS  fundsforusarmys: (https://)twitter.com/FundsForUSARMYs  Whatever happens: just enjoy the comeback armys, that's the most important. Comeback season is officially here, it's time for BE lockdown! Let's have lot of fun and joy together just like we had with Dynamite!

Stream rules for November 20  It needs to be viewed at ~ 480p or higher quality  ~ don't like without watching the video  ~ do not rewind while watching  ~ the sound must be at least half open  ~ Do not jump to 30 seconds.  30s if it's too long. ARMY vote on BTS in all categories for MAMA, the most prestigious award in Korea. All category is important but "Song of the Year" especially is in danger since 10% of the criteria is physical album sales and we don't have that here. We need to get at least 40% of the votes, we are at about 30% as of now. Please vote with all accounts daily, don't rely on the fandom, every vote matters! Here is the link to vote:  (https://)mama.mwave.me/en/vote  BTS is also nominated at the American Music Awards (AMA) in two categories, "Favorite Duo or Group-Pop Rock" and "Favorite Social Artist", make sure to vote for them in this too. They are not only nominated there, but they also gonna perform their title track "Life Goes On" from their brand new, very special and intimate self-directed album "BE" which will be released on November 20th at 2pm KST/12 am EST. The AMA is on November 22nd and the Grammy nominations will be announced November 24th. So much happening in a few days only, so many historical things. It's only up to us how historical it will be. Let's make this comeback bigger than anything. The album will be the most important album so far. And let's not let the boys empty handed after the AMAs. Vote on them in both categories here:  (https://)www.billboard.com/amasvote  Pre-order the new album "BE" here: (http://)biglink.to/bebts  Target has a buy 2 get 1 extra for free offer now, use this opportunity and split the price with  3 of your army friends to get your albums much cheaper. Spread the world!  You can also pre-order the title track "Life Goes On" on casettes. Vinyls are out of stock at the moment but keep an eye on the site, it's very likely they will be restocked: (https://)bts-be.us/  Pre-save BE on Spotify and Apple Music to be among the first ones who can listen to the new songs: (http://)bts-be.com  In case you don't know you can use iTunes on PC/laptop and Apple Music on PC/laptop/android too, you don't need an apple device. Just download them and you can buy the songs on iTunes in your country and stream from AM to help with overall charts. Apple Music has a 3 months free premium trial offer now.  Enjoy the comeback fam!  (And vote!)

- versi bahasa indonesia - Halo teman - teman semua,aku ingin mengajak kalian untuk streaming bersama untuk membuat dynamite menjadi "song of the year". Dynamite adalah sebuah single dan gak punya album fisik untuk mendorong dynamite menjadi "song of the year" seperti lagu - lagu sebelumnya. 2:29  When Yoongi kills it
LOS AMO <3
ARMYS the new BTS album, their very first self-directed album "BE" drops on November 20th Friday at 2pm KST/12am EST. Notice it's 2pm KST just like the last time, not midnight KST as in the past. This album is very important and intimate since the boys were heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. The boys put all of their hearts and souls into this monumental work and we also must work very hard to bring it as high as possible. We had crazy support with Dynamite since the song was in English but we all know how xenophobic and racist the industry works. Sadly the boys also know this, they even mentioned this not long before. They have the fear if there is that barrier after all and they won't be able to soar without the industry's heavy push. We can assume we won't get the same promo and radio support as Dynamite got. So please, let's work even harder  and show the boys, show the industry, show the whole world BTS doesn't need to change according to the industry's game, we are here for them, here for their music, here for their deep, comforting messages no matter the language. Because music transcends language and every barrier. We are here for them! Pre-order the album, pre-save it on Spotify and pre-add on Apple Music so you can be among the first ones to listen to the new songs. This way your streams will also be less filtered. If you want to lessen the chances of your streams being filtered get premium accounts on Spotify, Apple Music, Youtube etc. Streams from premium accounts weigh much more on charts so they will be extreme help for the comeback. You don't need money to get a premium account just get a free trial for a few months, they are always available and you can always get another one you just have to create another account and cancel your trial before they end.  Pre-save BE: (http://)bts-be.com Pre-order BE: (http://)biglink.to/bebts You can also pre-order the title track "Life Goes On" on casette. Vinyls are out of stock at the moment but keep an eye on the site, it's very likely they will be restocked: (https://)bts-be.us/  US Target has a buy 2 get 1 for free offer as of now, use this chance too! Talk to two of your army friends, buy 3 BE albums together and devide the price among you so you can get it for much cheaper!  Free premium trials, just click on the link and activate them on all platforms you use ->  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  AppleMusic: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D  When you stream we need very strong and consistent streams and for that we need to stream correctly and with dedication. To stream correctly what is very important is to never ever put the MV/song/album on repeat or autoplay. It's very important! While premium accounts and pre-saving the album are crucial in terms of our streams not being heavily filtered if you keep the same song or album or MV on repeat the system will consider you as bot and will filter most of your streams out. So don't do it! Best method on Spotify and Apple Music is to use short playlists which you switch frequently, about every hour. Interact with the playlists, skip or pause songs here and there, and switch playlists frequently. If you are in school, working, sleeping etc just use headset so you can still stream. On Youtube however don't use playlists! At least in the first 24 hours since views in youtube playlists are counted slower and more likely getting filtered, they would be sabotaging our first 24 hour goal - 105 Million views.  You might know the youtube channel xCeleste, she has many famous BTS videos here. She created a video about comeback goals and streaming tips, it can be very helpful, please watch it. By watching it you also help with collecting money for the comeback. Our fandom has some amazing funding accounts who would help you out if you'd like to buy the digital album/title track but don't have the money by the donations of other helpful armys. Now xCeleste will also give the complete revenue of this very video to these funding accounts to help. Watch it please, and watch it with NON premium accounts, watch the ads too, it's important. (Note: we only need premium accounts to stream official BTS MVs).  Here is her video:  (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=2WbWvvHLiLQ&ab_channel=xCeleste  There is also a whole youtube channel created by armys who make some interesting videos and they will also give the complete revenue of ALL of their videos to funding accounts. Watch their videos too if you can, play them in the background while studing, showering, cooking etc if you are not too interested in the actual videos. Use non-premium accounts for these too, don't skip the ads.   Here is their channel: (https://)www.youtube.com/channel/UCV9Zuj9cAn5m4KVV-A7yxxw  And here is a useful video of them about how to stream correctly: (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=x7shgYjQo4g&ab_channel=PlanetARMY  If you are a US/Puerto Rico army who wanna buy the digital album/title track but doesnt have the money for it you can ask for funds from the following funding accounts just make sure to read their terms so you can surely get it. Click on the links and check them out ->  fundsforbangtan:  Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan  borahaefunds:  (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds  usarmyfunds:  (https://)twitter.com/USARMYFUNDS  fundsforusarmys:  (https://)twitter.com/FundsForUSARMYs  Also, MAMA voting has started. It's the most prestigious Korean award show and these shows already did dirty to our boys in the past so let's make sure they get all the awards they are nominated in. For that to happen please vote on the boys in all category on the website, and keep streaming Dynamite MV on youtube. Streaming the MV is also important to keep the song high on the charts so it can be visible for Grammy voters. Grammy nominations are gonna be announced on November 24th, four days after BE comeback. This is another reason why it's extremely important to make this comeback huge and historical.  MAMA voting ->  (https://)mama.mwave.me/en/vote  The boys are going to promote the new title track "Life Goes On" on the American Music Awards (AMA) first on the November 22nd two days after its release where they are also nominated in Favorite Duo or Group-Pop Rock and Favorite Social Artist categories, make sure to vote on them there too so they won't be empty handed and their promo turns out the best.  AMA voting ->  (https://)www.billboard.com/amasvote  And let me tell you just one more thing. Don't let anyone guilt trip you and make you feel bad about wanting to support the boys and get them as high as possible. There are people who will try to tell you you are only here for the numbers and you can't enjoy the comeback ruining what the boys worked for. Don't listen to them, this is absolutely crap and they are just salty and wanna bring you down in hopes of sabotaging our comeback. Of course numbers are not everything and of course the boys create the music for us, to comfort us. But let me remind you: streaming literally means to listening to the music. All of us need feedbacks in our life that we are doing good, that what we do is not in vain and it has a reason. Numbers are not everything but believe it or not the boys do want numbers, they do wanna get high, they also do wanna reach their goals, their dreams. Yoongi said it already many times he wants to win a Grammy. That is impossible without high numbers, and high numbers are impossible without our help - since the industry is literally all about sabotaging them. They did a lot for us, the only way to pay them back for the love and comfort is to get them as high as possible. Some of you reading this are maybe baby armys or just haven't been around long enough but the boys have been sabotaged by the Korean music industry itself too since they debuted. They are where they are because of our dedication, they are here for us and we are here for them, that is why our bond and relationship is so special, stronger than any other artist has with their fans I might say. So it's all up to you what you think of this, but I advise you to not listen to this kind of negativity and don't think of comeback goals and streaming as a monotone, robotic method which ruins everything. It is just listening to the songs and wathching the MV, it should be all fun and joy.  One more last thing: don't let others to guilt trip you by telling you you are not a real fan if you don't buy BTS albums. That's not true, that's not what makes you a fan. You know your limit, what you can afford and what you can not, no one expects you, no one should force you to spend your money on things you can't afford to. You are just as valid as collectors who have everything, it does not determine how dedicated of a fan you are or how much you love the boys. I know people who buy their stuff, even go to their concerts and still throw them under the bus every chance they find and constantly complain about whatever the boys do. So please, don't let people bring you down, support the boys the best way you can. Just be there for the boys, love them, and help us with the comeback the way you can best. That's enough.  What's most important for you, for the boys, for all of us is to enjoy the comeback. Love this album and every song of it with the same love the boys created it with.   Happy comeback season everyone!

Nineteenth time to stream AND comment on  this MV since 6 Oct 2020. Let's take this past 100M before BE comes!
ØªØ®Ø¨Ù„Ù„Ù„
ATTENTION ARMYS: The new BTS album, their very first self-directed album "BE" drops in 1,5 weeks, November 20th at 2pm KST/12am EST. Notice it's 2pm KST just like the last time, not midnight KST as in the past.  The album is very important and intimate since the boys were heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. Just as an example: Taehyung worked on the photos and design of the album, and the MV is gonna be in GCF style directed by Jungkook.    Pre-save BE: (http://)bts-be.com  Pre-order BE: (http://)biglink.to/bebts  You can also pre-order the title track "Life Goes On" on casette. Vinyls are out of stock at the moment but keep an eye on the site, it's very likely they will be restocked: (https://)bts-be.us/    US Target has a buy 2 get 1 for free offer as of now, use this chance too! Talk to two of your army friends, buy 3 BE albums together and devide the price among you so you can get it for much cheaper!    There gonna be eight tracks together with Dynamite, the track list has just been released by bighit. The title track we need to focus on is called Life Goes On but we will still keep pushing Dynamite too and do everything to chart all B-side tracks in the hot 100 chart and the album in hot 200. For that we all need to work together, we need to stream harder and smarter than ever, and need to keep pushing the sales too. We are hoping but can't really expect too big of a support from radio stations since the album is gonna be in Korean and we all know how xenophobic and racist the industry is. Dynamite got a huge promo because it is in English and it's very likely radio stations will try to push it more but we need to concentrate on Life Goes On. We need those high streams more than ever!    How to get prepared for the comeback and be efficient: First, get a free premium trial on every streaming platform you use. If you already had one and it expired just create another account and activate the premium trial there. Why is it important? Because premium accounts can not be considered as bots and streams from those are less filtered. Also, streams from premium accounts weigh much more on the charts so they are extremely helpful. So don't hesitate, it only takes a minute, I'm gonna link you free trials on several platforms, just click on the links and activate them.    Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false    AppleMusic: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/    Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb    Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB    Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US    Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D    Basic rules about how to stream correctly:     - on youtube what you must know is playlists are our enemies there, especially in the first 24 hours when we want to reach our goal/break our record (our goal is 105M views in the first 24 hours). Views in youtube playlists are counted slower and many times get filtered. Don't use playlists in the first 24 hours, search for the MV manually and watch it like that. Watch 2-3 other official BTS videos after and search for the MV again. Don't refresh, don't repeat, don't put the MV on autoplay, never ever loop! Don't use small screen, and never mute. Don't stream our competition (recently released MV of other artists) and don't watch lyrics videos either. Bighit always adds translations to the MVs and armys are also sharing their translations, you don't need lyrics videos. They not only steal precious views but steal money from the boys and bh too since their videos are monetized. Report them without watching and move on. Same goes to reaction videos too. Nicer reactors are respectful enough to upload their reactions the second day. Avoid the others at least in the first 24 hours, be smart. Bighit will release audio videos of all the tracks on youtube, stream those and Dynamite in between Life Goes On. That way we can not only make the tracks trend but your streams gonna be counted to the charts too      - on Spotify and Apple Music DO USE playlists! However it's important to interact with them to look less botlike. No matter how much you love a song never put it on repeat, never loop! Use your free premium trials and create your own short playlists or use other people's playlists, you can find many of them, and switch them frequently. It's important fam! Switch playlists every hour, never loop, and never mute! If you can't stream because you are in school or working or sleeping etc just plug in your headset, that way you can keep streaming. Check other prople's playlists before using them in case they were created by antis, they like to hide their fav artists' songs in them so you would accidentally stream them too. Hide all other artists' songs if you stream from big playlists like Today's Top Hits etc, don't stream our competitions anywhere.     - important thing about Apple Music which is not known by many is you can use AM even if you don't have an apple device. You can download iTunes on PC/laptop and you can download Apple Music on PC/mobile. Another important thing not many knows is if you buy a track or MV on iTunes (yes, you can buy MV too and you should if you can afford) they will automatically end up in your Apple Music library. Now you must go there and delete them from your library before you start streaming or otherwise your streams won't count there!    About buying tracks: if your own country's chart accounts don't say otherwise buy the tracks from the album separately. If you can please buy all the tracks. If you can't afford to then buy the title track "Life Goes On" at least on as many platforms as you can. Our focus is Life Goes On.    Now if you are a US/PR army who wanna buy the digital album/title track and don't have the money for it you can ask for funds from funding accounts. We have several very reliable funding accounts created by armys who help US/PR armys to buy the tracks by using donations from other helpful armys. Just read their terms carefully to make sure you get the funds.    Here are our funding accounts for US/PR armys:    fundsforbangtan:    Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate  Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan    borahaefunds:    (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds    usarmyfunds:    (https://)twitter.com/USARMYFUNDS    fundsforusarmys:    (https://)twitter.com/FundsForUSARMYs    If you are no US/PR army but wanna help them with the sales and reaching our goals on the charts you can send money to these funding accounts.   If you wanna help but don't have the money for it you can still help! There is a whole new youtube account created by armys, PlanetARMY,  who give all revenue from their videos to funding accounts. You just have to watch their videos to help. The more views the better so spread them to other armys. Warning! While we need the premium accounts for streaming BTS, in this case use a non premium youtube account. Premium accounts don't get ads on youtube, but these youtube accounts get their money mostly by viewers watching ads. So watch all short ads and skip the long ones after 30 seconds. But don't forget, this is only for these videos. When you stream BTS MVs we NEED the premium accounts!    Here is their youtube channel: (https://)www.youtube.com/channel/UCV9Zuj9cAn5m4KVV-A7yxxw    Here is a useful video of them about how to stream correctly: (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=x7shgYjQo4g&ab_channel=PlanetARMY    You most probably know xCeleste too, her videos of BTS are very famous on youtube. She also created a video which's complet revenue she will send to our funding accounts. Watch her video again with a non premium account, also share it with other armys so it can reach more: (https://)www.youtube.com/watch?v=2WbWvvHLiLQ&ab_channel=xCeleste    Here you can find more information about comeback goals in different countries:  (https://)beiscoming.com/be-goals/    And lastly: don't forget to vote on BTS on MAMA, it's the most prestigious Korean award show. We must make sure they win all the awards, we saw some ugly things these shows pulled on them in the past so let's don't give them a chance to do something tricky.    (https://)mama.mwave.me/en/vote    The boys are gonna promote the new song "Life Goes On" on the American Music Awards (AMA) first where they are also nominated in Favorite Duo or Group-Pop Rock and Favorite Social Artist categories, make sure to vote on them there too so they won't be empty handed and their promo turns out to be the best. Here you can vote:  (https://)www.billboard.com/amasvote    This album is so important, so intimate and meaningful, no album has ever been this monumental so let's make it historical! Yoongi can't take part in the promotions because of his serious shoulder surgery he just went through sadly, it must be very devastating for him after working so hard and putting all their hearts into this beautiful masterpiece. The boys also expressed their fears and sadness of the unfair treatment of the industry towards them and wondered if they can ever break records with songs in their native language too and not just in English. Jimin also said one of his wishes is to land all tracks of the new album on billboard hot 100.    Let's do this fam! Let's do this for the boys, let's make them happy, let's show them language is no barrier! Teamwork makes the dream work! Spread these rules, tips, infos too with as many armys as you can and on as many platforms as you can, many are still unaware even of the comback. It's on literally next Friday! We can do this!    And most of all: enjoy the comeback and all the new, beautiful music the boys are blessing us with.    Borahae~

my best of favorite song
ARMY, the new BTS album, their first ever self-directed album "BE" is dropping on November 20 at 2pm KST/12am EST. This is their most important and intimate comeback so far, the boys are heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. Just as an example Taehyung works on the photos and design of the album, and the MV is gonna be in GCF style directed by Jungkook.  The album is gonna be in Korean which will make it difficult to reach our goals. We did an outstanding job to break all records with Dynamite but the song was in English hence we had all the promotion. However even the members expressed they can feel the unfair way music industry is treating them and they told us their wishes and fears if they can chart a Korean album just as high. Let's do it for the boys, let's work hard together on the comeback to reach even higher and show them how music really transcends languages and there are no barriers to enjoy good music especially if it has an important message. Let's also break those records for Yoongi who just has been through a serious shoulder surgery and can't participate in the promotion of the album they worked so hard on and put all their hearts into. Let's ease his mind and make him and all the members happy!  Pre-order BE: (http://)biglink.to/bebts Pre-save BE: (http://)bts-be.com  Some tips to stream in an efficient way:  #1 thing you can do is to get a premium account on all streaming platforms by a free premium trial. Why are they important? Premium accounts can not be considered as bots hence streams from those will less likely filtered. Also, streams from premium accounts weigh much more than from non premium accounts. So don't hesitate and activate the free trials, I'm gonna link you some below. If you had one for Dynamite comeback (many of us activated one back then) it's most probably expired since then or will soon. No problem, just create another account and activate the free trial there too. You can do this in the future as many times as you want.   Free premium trials, just click on the link and activate them (delete the brackets):  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  AppleMusic: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D  How to stream on Youtube correctly: first, get your free premium trial through the link above. Don't use playlists in the first 24 hours ever! Even better if on the first week or at all. Views in playlists are counted slower so they very much affect our first 24 hour record (105M views) and more likely get filtered. Let's not repeat the ON case, it was devastating to watch. Also, never ever loop! Be it an MV or song on other platforms, never loop, never put them on repeat, never put them on autoplay! No matter how much you enjoy the song your streams will be filtered. Also don't stream on small screen, and don't mute the MV. Stream manually, search the MV in the searching bar, watch 2-3 other preferably BTS videos after (bighit will most probably upload all tracks from BE as audio videos, stream those), then search for and watch the MV again. If you really can't stream like that rather put the videos in a queue than using playlists.  How to stream correctly on Spotify: first, get your free premium trial through the link above. Use playlists! Make them short with 2-3 songs in between the title track "Life Goes On", preferably songs from BE or MOTS7 albums or Dynamite. If you stream from other armys' playlists check them out beforehand in case they were actually created by antis, they used to hide their favs' music in the playlists so we would give them accidental streams. Don't ever stream our competitions (recently released songs of other artists) no matter how much you like them. If you are an army know that streaming others is self-sabotage during comeback. Concentrate on BTS please. Another thing is to interact with your playlists. Switch them frequently, about every hour, pause or skip some songs here and there to look less botlike. And never ever loop! Never repeat a song, never put on autoplay! Also don't mute!  How to stream correctly on Apple Music: first of all what many don't know is you can stream on AM even if you don't have an apple device, just download it on your android. Same goes for iTunes. You can buy the tracks and MV (yes, MV too) on iTunes even if you don't have the device for it as long as iTunes is available in your country. Just download the app on your PC/laptop. So. Get the AM account, activate the free trail through the link above and log in to your iTunes.  Another thing many don't know about AM is if you bought a song or MV on iTunes it's gonna end up in your AM library and if you stream things which are already there your streams won't be counted. So what you need to do if you buy the tracks and/or MV on iTunes is to go to your AM library and delete them from there. That's all. Just delete from library after buying them and your streams will be counted! Now AM playlists should look a bit different from Spotify. On Spotify you should put more songs between the title track. On AM the less the better. 1 max 2 songs are enough. Interact with your playlists, switch them every hour, pause and skip songs here and there.  Here too if you stream from others' playlists which is the easiest way check them beforehand to make sure not to stream our competitions. Don't loop, don't put the songs or MV on repeat ever! No matter which platform you use. And don't mute!  If you are at school, are working or sleeping just use headset so no one can hear you streaming. But again, never mute.  Also, please ignore lyric videos, they are stealing our views, some not only stealing views but even get money for it basically even stealing money from our boys (khhmmmm jaeguchi khhhhmmmmm). If you see lyrics videos please report them without watching and keep streaming official videos from ibighit or bangtantv.  Another thing. If you are a US/PR army who wanna buy the digital album and/or title track but don't have the money you can ask for funds from funding accounts. They are helping out US/PR armys with the donations of other armys to be able to reach our goals. If you are not a US/PR army but would like to help them out with buying the album/title track and get the #1 hot 100 and #1 hot 200 on Billboard chart you can donate to those funding accounts.  Links for funding accounts:  fundsforbangtan:  Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan  borahaefunds:  (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds  usarmyfunds:  (https://)twitter.com/USARMYFUNDS  fundsforusarmys:  (https://)twitter.com/FundsForUSARMYs  These are all very reliable accounts. Just read their terms carefully to make sure you get the funds.  Lastly here is a survey. It was made by an army and it is to see how well-prepared the fandom is about the comeback. It takes only 2-3 minutes to fill out and is very fun and useful. You can surely see it yourself too if you are aware of everything. Never too late to catch up, we still have 1,5 week. Make sure to fill out the survey and send it to other armys too. Let's make the best out of this comeback fam!  (https://)docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe6-xXWdzKmZPmu3EUeM-ctV6uUfmCArQKdbgis21NO-KIQ3w/viewform  And most of all: enjoy the comeback. This is gonna be the most beautiful and meaningful comeback so far, let's make sure it's gonna be the most historical one, too.  Teamwork makes the dream work!

*12 Days Until 'BE'!*
