I love the B side more than the MVğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
BTS's new album, their first ever self-directed album "BE" is coming on the 20th November at 2pm KST/12am EST. The boys are heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. Last time we did an outstanding job breaking all records with Dynamite, let's repeat it with this very important and intimate album.  Our youtube goal is 105 Million views in the first 24 hours and 250 Million by the end of the week. Some streaming tips on all platforms to make sure we bring the best out of us and reach all of our goals: The #1 thing we need to make all armys familiar with is owning a premium account. Not many can afford a premium account but that is okay since that is what free premium trials are for. All you need to do is activate a trial be it on Youtube, Spoitfy, Apple Music etc. If you alredy got one for Dynamite it most probably expired since then or about to soon. No problem, you just need to create another account and activate the trial there too. Why are premium accounts so important? Streams from a premium account not only weigh more but since it's a premium account you can not be considered a bot and your streams will less likely be filtered. It is extremely important to get premium accounts so spread the word and make more people to get one for the come back. It doesn't take much time and costs absolutely nothing with a free trial but it makes a huuuuge difference when it comes to streams. Many got the trials for Dynamite comeback and look at the numbers we reached! We broke all of our goals. That's how impactful it is! Now some tips for youtube streams: aside from having a premim account it's important not to use playlists on this platform! Search the MV manually, watch it, watch other videos in between - bighit will most probably upload B-side tracks from the album on youtube so best if you watch those and Dynamite MV - then watch the new MV again. If you are busy and can't stream manually better put the videos in a queue than using playlists. Youtube counts views slower in playlists and also more likely filters them out so it's better to avoid it especially the first 24 hours but even better the first week since that perioud is the most crucial. Also never repeat a video, don't use autoplay, don't loop. Never ever loop on any platform! Your streams will be filtered then. Spotify and Apple Music tips: what many don't know about AM or iTunes is that you can use these even if you don't have apple device, all you need is to download the app on your PC/laptop. That way you can buy the song and MV (yes, the MV too) on iTunes and then stream it on PC or even on your android phone. AM works on android! What's also very important and many don't know is if you buy a song on iTunes it automatically ends up in your AM library and streams of songs which are in your library won't be counted. So what you must do after buying the title song and MV on iTunes is go to your Apple Music library and delete them from there. After that all your streams will count. On these platforms do USE playlists! But you need to use them correctly in order for your streams to not get filtered. First of all again most important is to get a premium account, can be via a free trial. After that either create your own playlist or use other armys playlists but in that case check them out beforehand. Antis like to create fake playlists where they hide their fav artists' songs between BTS songs so you would accidentally stream them. Also if you stream from big playlists like Today's Top Hits for example make sure to hide other songs so you won't give other artists streams. If you are a 100% army don't stream our competition (recently released songs of other artists) even if you love them too, that would be self sabotage.  Now Spotify and Apple Music works a bit differently. On Spotify you need to put more songs in between the title track "Life Goes On" or else you can be considered bot and your streams will be easily filtered. Put 2 or rather 3 songs in between, from the new album BE and MOTS7, and also Dynamite of course. On apple put only 1 or max 2 songs in between, again either songs from BE and MOTS7 or Dynamite. It's very likely Dynamite will be on BE, also MOTS7 and Dynamite are nominated for Grammys and MAMA so we are still working hard on those too. Another very important thing about streaming on Spotify and Apple Music: don't! loop! As I already mentioned before looping/puting a song on repeat/autoplay gets the streams filtered out. It's understandable if you are addicted to the new songs but please stream correctly to make your streaming efficient. What you can also help a lot to get you look less botlike with is interacting with your playlists, meaning pausing, skipping songs here and there. And also very important: switch playlists frequently! Don't make them too long and switch them every hour at least. If you are working or in school just use headset so no one can hear you listenintg to the songs and keep streaming. So to sum it up: use free premium trails to stream from premium accounts, use playlists - except on youtube - , and don't loop/put songs on repeat anywhere! These are the most important rules. If you got to this part congratulations, i admire you. Please let other armys know about these methods too, you can help a lot with that since many still don't even know about the comeback let alone how to stream correctly. Last time we did an amazing job with Dynamite, I know we can repeat it. Do it for the boys, do it for Yoongi too who can't take part in the promotions of BE because of his serious shoulder surgery. Let's make him and the other boys happy by breaking records and reaching our goals again as a payback.  Let's work hard together and most of all: happy comeback season fam!  Here are some useful links for you (delete the brackets).  Pre-order BE: (http://)biglink.to/bebts Pre-save BE: (http://)bts-be.com   Free trials if you need, you just have to activate them:  Spotify: (https://)www.spotify.com/us/premium/?checkout=false  AppleMusic: (https://)www.apple.com/apple-music/  Pandora: pdora.co/2PEG6Lb  Deezer: (https://)www.deezer.com/us/?origin=Adwords&utm_campaign=acq-Adwords_Brand_Free&utm_content=homepage&utm_medium=search-obj_sub&utm_source=adwords&gclid=Cj0KCQjwvb75BRD1ARIsAP6LcqtXkTfGGjq06IfvoRfM8PPUqmnr9NRh79ykjGCva99uAtrw8enB5AEaAqg0EALw_wcB  Tidal: (https://)offer.tidal.com/?geo=US  Youtube: (https://)www.youtube.com/premium?ybp=OgIIEEoNCAYSCXVubGltaXRlZA%253D%253D   Funding accounts for US/PR armys who don't have the money to buy the digital album/title track but would like to, these accounts will help you out with money donated by other armys:  fundsforbangtan:  Website: (https://)www.fundsforbangtan.com/donate Twitter: (https://)twitter.com/fundsforbangtan  borahaefunds:  (https://)twitter.com/borahaefunds  Fighting ARMY!
Dynamite #Army BTS  Army Army #Army1

*BTS will release their NEW ALBUM â€œBEâ€ on NOVEMBER 20 at 2 PM KST the title trackâ€™s name is â€œLife Goes Onâ€. On November 22 BTS will perform â€œLife Goes Onâ€ for the first time at the American Music Awards.*
ğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œğŸ’œ
@ BTS Y. ARMI
The new BTS album, their first ever self-directed album "BE" is coming on the 20th November at 2pm KST/Midnight EST. The boys are heavily involved in production, composition and design making it the most "BTS-esque" music yet. Last time we did an outstanding job breaking all records with Dynamite, let's repeat it with this very important and intimate album.   Our goal is 105 Million views on Youtube in the first 24 hours and 250 Million by the end of the week. As always it is very important to have premium accounts on all streaming platforms to avoid being considered a bot and your streams being deleted. It clearly worked last time and it's even more important to do the same this time. No album has been as important as this one before. If your free premium trials have expired since Dynamite it's all fine, all you need to do is create another account and get your free premium trials for that. Gonna leave some links for free premium trials on different streaming platforms under this text. Please get them before the comeback and spread the word. Very important: spread the word on social media with as many people as you can, many still unaware sadly.   Another important thing is: stream smart instead of stream hard. Use playlists on Spotify and Apple Music, avoid putting our competitions (recently released music) in the playlists, even hide such artists so you won't accidentally stream them when using big playlists like Today's Top Hits for example. Very important to switch your playlists frequently otherwise your streams will be filtered. Stream even when you are in school, at work, are asleep using a pair of headset so no one can hear it. Also very important: on Youtube do NOT use playlists! Views in playlists are usually filtered and even counted slower meaning they will be very damaging to use especially in the first 24 hours. Stream manually on youtube, search the MV manually, watch it, watch a few other videos then search for the MV again and so on. If you wanna stream while sleeping or working rather put the MV on a queue. You can put it as many time as you want just put other videos in between, too. It's more efficient than playlists.  Lastly, don't forget: use shazam to search for the song. Shazaming helps with radio spins. The more shazam the more recognized the song is gonna be by radio stations and the more spins they will get. So far it seems like Columbia Records is rather pushing Dynamite, it's possible the new album/single is gonna get the same ugly treatment as ON has gotten since it's gonna be in Korean unlike Dynamite was. We can not let the same happening to this meaningful album so we have to stream, buy and shazam extra hard. Once the album and title song are released buy them on every platform you can especially iTunes. If you are US/PR army and have no money for it you can always ask for funds from funding accounts such as fundsforbangtan and borahaefunds. Gonna leave links below. If you are no US/PR army but wanna help them buy the song on iTunes so we can break more records and get the #1 Hot 100 with the title song and #1 Hot 200 with the album you can always send donations to the same accounts which they will use to funds US/PR armys with.   As you all must know by now Yoongy went through a serious surgery because of his shoulder which he broke before their debut in 2012 and got in a much worse condition ever since. He was pushing through the pain and working hard on this come back but doctors told him the best he can do is if he gets through the surgery now. So sadly he can not take part in the promotions of BE. We all must understant how devastating this must be to him especially after putting all their hearts and feelings into this album. So let's make it the most succesful BTS album so far! Let's work hard together to pay the boys back all the love and joy we got from them, to pay back all the hard work they put into it! Let's make Yoongi and all the boys happy by turning their dreams into reality! Also, don't forget to stream Dynamite in the meantime, the song is nominated for Grammys and also MAMA, the most prestigious award show in Korea.    Let's get this fam! Now this is the reason why I love BTS so much: please do take time to read this: Ahem..... BTS came from a small company, they started with nothing. Jin who was casted just because of his looks, Suga who left his family and gambled his education just to do what he really wanted to be, Namjoon who was never have been supported by his parents, Jimin who thought himself as ugly and fat, Taehyung whose always been part of BTS but was never shown in any promotions- not until they debut, Hoseok who seemed to always laugh but never felt as an accomplishment to his father, And Jungkook who was very shy and have saved his parents at a young age by auditioning to companies. Remember the days when they were struggling? They even have to sacrifice and work hard just so they could eat? They were squeezing themselves into one small apartment and have to take responsibilities- the reason why they wrote the song 'Move'. Those times when Jimin has to starve himself just because people calls him fat and ugly. That one interview where Yoongi said that; it was nice that people listens to their music because Taehyung and Jungkook are good looking. And he thought that it was at least enough. Do you remember when Hoseok was supposed to be the vocalist and Taehyung is the rapper, but he chose to rap instead and learn it because Taehyung wants to be a Vocalist. It was Taehyung's dream and Hoseok loves his dongsaeng that much he would sacrifice. Other fan base were accusing them for plagiarism just because they had the smallest detail whose the same with other big K-pop group which is actually just a coincidence. There was a time when Yoongi packed 300 gifts and letters just to give to their 300 fans who will attend at their mini fan meetings. So why do people judge them so fastly? Did you know that Jimin came all the way to Seoul from Busan just to persuade his dreams? Did you know that Taehyung lived with his grandma gor almost half of his life making him innocent from what else is out there in our world? Did you know that Jungkook set aside his embarrassment just to meet the others expectations? Yes, he is the golden maknae, but he suffers too when he see his hyungs having a hard time, he cries. And there was a time when Jimin caught him crying and the reason is because he misses his family. Jungkook often cry secretly so that his hyungs wouldn't worry. Did you know that Jin auditioned to make his mother proud of him and so that his mom would have something to brag off to those judgmental neighbors they have. He worked hard on his vocals yet people called him talentless. Did you know that Namjoon worked hard just to produce songs yet there was a time when his mom ruined his computer and broke his mike so he could focus on studying? Did you know that Hoseok auditioned because he wanted his father to be proud of him? Because he felt like he was a disappointment? Those rookie days where they only listen to the awardings and be amazed by their seniors. They can't do anything but to watch those idols who receives the awards. The days when they were happy with just 300 views on YouTube, mini fangatherings, small numbers of followers, and one Daesang award. They were contented. And now they've reached to the top and became more successful. From 150 fans to 6M and counting, From a small practice room to a bigger one, From cramped dorm with roommates to big dorm with each of them having a room, From one daesang award to more awards and they've even won on BBMAs. HRS never expected this before their fourth year anniversary, they've come so far- so far that the only chance we have to see them is to go to their concertor (NEVER) meet them along the street with 0.01% chance. But really ARMYs! We've came this far fam, let's love them and give them our support till the end! I wanted to thank y'all. I love you fam! I love BTS. Let's stay together until the end. If you believe in what I've said. If you believe in 1! 2! 3! Just spreading the messageğŸ˜ŒğŸ˜”ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡

ë°©íƒ„ ì˜¤ë¼ë²„ë‹ˆë“¤ ìê¾¸ ì œ ì‹¬ì¥ì„ í­í–‰í•˜ì‹œë©´ ê°€ë§Œì•ˆë‘˜ê²ë‹ˆ                                                  ë‹¤ì´ë„ˆë§ˆì´íŠ¸ ì›Œìš°ì›Œ
SUGA'S HEALTH INFORMATION   SUGA underwent surgery to repair his torn shoulder labrum on November 3. The surgery, to address a problem that had constantly been a health and wellness issue for SUGA, was completed successfully and he is currently resting and recovering following his physicians advice that SUGA must undergo a strict and unhindered period of recovery.  As many fans know, SUGA has long suffered from shoulder-related health issues. SUGA's shoulder issues began when he was injured in an accident that occured in 2012 before his debut, and he was diagnosed with a dislocated shoulder in 2013. Shoulder pains continued until he was further diagnosed in 2019 with "posterior labral tear of his left shoulder", which means that the cartilage around his left shoulder joint has been torn. Since then, he has continued to receive various treatment to prevent his injury from affecting his activities.  SUGA has long suffered from a wide range of symptoms including the inability to raise his arms high and sudden bouts of pain. He underwent constant rehabilitation and treatment during his career, but unfortunately his symptoms did not improve measurably. These symptoms have appeared with increasing frequency in recent years, affecting SUGA not only on the stage but in the course of his daily life as well.  SUGA also felt that it was important for him to restore himself to good health to prepare for his mandatory military service as well as his post service musical career. After extensive discussion with the company, the decision was made to undergo the surgical procedure,  Following the surgery, SUGA will be unable to participate in most official activities so that he may fully focus on his recovery. Once doctors determine that the site of the operation has healed sufficiently, SUGA will begin physical therapy so that he can ultimately return to the stage healthy and fully recovered.  #GetWellSoonYoongi â™¡  Now ARMY We have to Make this Comeback a BLOCKBUSTER   *ATTENTION ARMYS* ğŸ‘‡ CONFIRMED "BE" GOALS ARE HERE:  *BTS "BE" COMEBACK GOALS* *(20 NOVEMBER 2020)* *(12 AM ETÂ  /Â  2PM KST)*  â–  *7 Million Album Sales Worldwide*  â€¢Billboardâ€¢ â–ªï¸ *700,000 Album Units (SPS)* â–ªï¸ *150,000 Title Track Sales*  â€¢#1 on Billboard 200 â€¢#1 on Billboard Hot 100 (Title Track) _(ALL ALBUM SONGS IN BILLBOARD HOT 100)_ â€¢#1 on Billboard Global 200 â€¢#1 on Billboard Global Excl US â€¢#1 on Billboard Artist 100  â€¢YouTubeâ€¢ â€¢4M in YT mv Premier  â€¢105M in 24 hours â€¢9M Likes in 24 hours â€¢230M in First week  *(MUST KEEP IN MIND)* â—Â  If Possible try to Use *YT Premium* it will not delete views from mv. â— Don't Loop the mv â— Watch the mv in 480p or more â— Don't Use Playlist for First day â—Watch 3-4 videos before coming back to mv. â—Don'tÂ  report spam comments fastly because if we'll report more then YT will freeze because of soo many reports about spAm from mv and Lastly WILL DELETE VIEWS. Here's my 'Dynamite' and basically my 'Army' story. I was so down, we just brought my youngest son at the hospital because of seizures and after a couple of weeks I found out that I was positive of Corona (asymptomatic btw but still). Had to be brought to an isolation facility and stay there for a couple of weeks. We had a huge debt because of the bills and I was all alone and worried about my other kids. There's no time of the day that I didn't cried, was even thinking about ending it all. And then one day, I turned to our local music station and saw the MV of BTS' Dynamite I was blown away. The vibes just sunk into me, and I cried again but not because of depression but because of hope. That all will be well. Now I'm all okay and so is my kid.  And to the boys, thank you for bringing good vibes for someone who has chosen to give up. Borahae!  Edit: I also draw Jungkook, he's my bias. I posted it on my Insta and Twitter.

Hello there!! This is a totally random comment but please give this a read..umm since English is not my first language so some mistakes are bound to happen, I apologize for it in advance.. I just want few minutes of your precious time..I was just curious about the state of animals in the slaughter houses across the world so I did some research on the net and watched some videos and it shook me mentally and physically..the brutality made me wanted to do something for them..for those poor souls who have to suffer so much.. although there is so much that I wanted to say but I won't take a lot of your time.. please I humbly request you to cut down on your meat(every type) for just two days a week,and choose some veggies instead..it will not only make you live a healthier life but indirectly save many innocent lives and do something amazing for this planet,you will feel good mentally as well since you did a great thing.. thanks a lot for your time..( Since, I am a very sensitive person I've switched off my notifications..coz I can't deal with negativity) thanks again.
Hello there!! This is a totally random comment but please give this a read..umm since English is not my first language so some mistakes are bound to happen, I apologize for it in advance.. â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤â¤
